metadata.name: Node Process Executions
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of other scripts using the Node executable packaged with Adobe Creative Cloud

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\adobe creative cloud experience\\libs\\node.exe')) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('adobe creative cloud experience\\js')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of other scripts using the Node executable packaged with Adobe Creative Cloud

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.name, process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown Reference: https://twitter.com/mttaggart/status/1511804863293784064
